p: Fertilization success was assessed in subsamples (3 × 100 eggs per batch and P co 2 treatment), which were incubated within sealed petri dishes until the 8/16-cell stage (Atlantic cod: 12 hours, 5°C; Polar cod: 24 hours, 3°C) and photographed under a stereomicroscope for subsequent evaluation (table S3). These images were also used to determine the mean egg diameter of an egg batch (30 eggs per batch, table S3).
